stories.text:
TLDR: What timezone should I use for an alpha launch on Tuesday?

Hi Everyone, Call me superstitious but this is just too good to pass up for an origin story. But, what timezone should it be? As a dev from the valley(x-LinkedIn) and a Californian (by heart, grew up in Ethiopia) I am thinking PT, but I am currently sitting at my apartment at Harvard Business School so I kind of feel like a poser. Thoughts? and WWYD? If you are launching as well, feel free to drop a line and we can pull all nighters together over discord @Yonz#3679.

Shameless plug: First 1000 people here will get beta access and lifelong FREE accesshttps://allspark.substack.com/

What is it? See if you can figure it out with the scavenger hint: We will 'Innov8'!
stories.title: Ask HN: What Timezone to Launch 2:22PM on 02/22/2022

stories.text:
I personally use https://hn.premii.com for the topic on the left and the conversation on the right. Customizing the colors is also nice. The drawback is there doesn't appear to be a good way to participate in the conversation.

How does everyone else ingest HN?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you view HN?
